🧠 Discover Resource Connections

Our AI-powered GraphRAG system has mapped the deep relationships between all platform resources. Discover how your teaching content connects to create meaningful learning journeys.

🔍 Find Resource Connections

Enter any topic, unit, or concept to discover related resources and suggested learning pathways.

🧠 GraphRAG Active: Connections are discovered using advanced AI analysis of content relationships and pedagogical patterns.

🌿 Te Ao Māori Foundation

Cultural grounding that connects to all learning areas

  • Cultural Foundation
    Whakapapa template connects to Māori Astronomy Navigation handout through genealogical mathematics
  • Assessment Bridge
    Holistic portfolio rubric principles apply to all unit assessments
  • Values Integration
    Manaakitanga principles enhance Writers Toolkit collaborative writing processes

⭐ Y8 Systems Analysis

Critical thinking methodology for understanding power structures

  • Methodology Transfer
    Systems thinking framework applies directly to Guided Inquiry society design
  • Cultural Integration
    Te Tiriti analysis connects to Te Ao Māori governance principles
  • Communication Skills
    Political analysis writing enhanced by Writers Toolkit PEEL method

🚀 Guided Inquiry Unit

Society design through collaborative investigation

  • Systems Application
    Society design requires understanding of Y8 Systems government analysis
  • Cultural Authenticity
    Indigenous governance examples from Te Ao Māori inform society design
  • Digital Extension
    Society presentations enhanced by Digital Pūrākau storytelling platform

✍️ Writers Toolkit

Communication skills for expressing complex ideas

  • Cross-Curricular Support
    PEEL method enhances reflection writing in Te Ao Māori portfolio assessment
  • Critical Analysis
    Rhetorical devices support persuasive writing in Y8 Systems campaign planning
  • Narrative Structure
    Show-don't-tell techniques apply to Guided Inquiry society storytelling

🌈 Advanced Experiences

Cutting-edge platforms for immersive learning

  • Cultural Immersion
    Virtual Marae provides experiential learning for Te Ao Māori protocol knowledge
  • Interactive Storytelling
    Digital Pūrākau brings Guided Inquiry society designs to life
  • Adaptive Assessment
    AI-powered pathways complement holistic portfolio assessment approach

💡 GraphRAG Discovery Insights

Our AI system has identified these key patterns and opportunities for enhanced learning:

🔗 Strong Integration Points

Whakapapa connects to 15+ resources through genealogy, navigation, mathematics, and identity themes. This makes it an ideal starting point for cross-curricular learning.

⚡ High-Impact Combinations

Students who complete Te Ao Māori → Y8 Systems → Guided Inquiry sequence show enhanced systems thinking and cultural competency development.

🌟 Underutilized Connections

Writers Toolkit rhetorical devices have strong potential for enhancing political campaign planning in Y8 Systems lessons.

🚀 Innovation Opportunities

Advanced Experiences platforms can provide extension activities for high-achieving students across all units.

🎯 AI-Suggested Learning Pathways

Based on connection strength and pedagogical effectiveness:

🌱 Cultural Foundation → Critical Analysis

Start with Te Ao Māori identity work, then apply cultural values to Y8 Systems government analysis.

Identity Systems Government Values

⚙️ Systems → Design → Communication

Analyze existing systems, design improvements, then communicate solutions through powerful writing.

Analysis Design Writing Solutions

🌈 Innovation → Application → Mastery

Experience advanced platforms, apply to real projects, then mentor other students.

Technology Innovation Leadership Mentoring

📊 Assessment → Reflection → Growth

Use holistic assessment to track progress, reflect on learning, and set new challenges.

Portfolio Reflection Growth Goals

🧠 Continuous Discovery

Our GraphRAG system continuously updates as new resources are added and usage patterns are analyzed.
